people_also_ask.question: Is node JS frontend or backend?
people_also_ask.heading: Initially written by Ryan Dahl in 2009, Node is a JavaScript-based back-end technology. According to the official documentation: Node. js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.16-May-2021
